de.susebox.jtopas
Interface Plugin

All Known Subinterfaces:
KeywordHandler, SeparatorHandler, SequenceHandler, WhitespaceHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
TestPluginTokenizer
Deprecated. replaced by the de.susebox.jtopas.spi package

public interface Plugin

This is the base interface for all handler pluggins in the PluginTokenizer. Since generally plugins need to know their parent Tokenizer, this interface is provided to pass that instance to the plugin.

With the introduction of Tokenizer, TokenizerProperties, StandardTokenizer StandardTokenizerProperties, this interface is not longer in use. The functionality is more or less transfered to the de.susebox.jtopas.spi package and its interfaces.

Author:
Heiko Blau
See Also:
Tokenizer, AbstractTokenizer

Method Summary
 void setTokenizer(PluginTokenizer tokenizer)
          Deprecated. When registering an instance that implements this interface, the PluginTokenizer will call this method to make itself known to the SeparatorHandler instance in turn.
